events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issues was identified as a refund request related to a product return due to sizing problems.
Assigning an agent specialized in refund requests to handle this case effectively.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your return. I'm here to help you through the refund process quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 4589321. The jacket has never been worn outside and is still in the packaging it came with.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately once the returned jacket is shipped back to us.
That sounds great, thank you! I'll send the jacket back today and provide you with the tracking number.
We've received your tracking information and confirmed the return has been processed. Your refund will be completed within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that your refund has been processed and you should see the amount back in your account shortly.
Thank you for contacting us. We are closing this case now, but feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
